I just hate all of you assholes bragging in front of me about your winner life's flaw.

Jan 18, 2026 • the42game

It’s like… I don’t know if you guys are doing it on purpose, or just you are terribly bad at “空気読め”
But can you guys just STOP MENTIONING HOW BAD YOU LIVE OR HOW TERRIBLE A DECISION YOU’VE MADE when it’s OBIVIOUS THAT NO MATTER HOW “BAD” YOU LIVE, YOU STILL GOT A FAR FUCKING SUPERIOR LIFE THAN ME.

Just stop it and get some rest, really.
Like, your mis-step or failure is like you messed up a single note so you didn’t win that whatever fucking international piano contests’(which your parent had it all arrange for you, and there wasn’t really much effort you need, just 2 years worth of afternoon class with a private teacher every Friday after you done with your private fucking school or sth) first prize and you can’t go to sleep all night when you was like 7yo.
Or your pain is you didn’t get that praise from some specific teacher back in your “painful-youth” at an international school or whatever.

I simply, don’t gives a fucking shit about it, nor is it some shit I could really fucking relates to, FULL FUCKING STOP.

Let’s make it clear, I am not poor or rich, simply a fucking college student in a middle-lower income working class family, and this is my limit, alright? Ofc, I knew there’s some improvements that COULD’VE BEEN MADE BACK IN THOSE DAYS BUT THATS HOW THIS WORLD WORKS!
I went to public schools, most of my life(sometimes I went to private schools that it’s only purpose is to rip my wallet off but is the only way I could get a Bachelor degree), I don’t have rich fucking parents to help me with my shit, I learnt all this crap on my fucking own, in my fucking own free time, 50/50 on my fucking own free will/or being forced to. In order to talk to you bunch of fucking motherfucking mosquitoes that only knows how to suck on others suffering in a fucking greenhouse.

Just fucking stop, and don’t pretend you could relate with lower class(than you)’s miserable life.
It’s GROSS!

FUCK YOU.
